rule.condition: current.phase in $L.file.save="Implementation" or current.phase in $L.file.save="Execution" or current.phase in $L.file.save="Deployment" or current.phase in $L.file.save="Distribution and Rollout"
rule.conditionDesc: ( Phase in SavedRecord = "Implementation" OR Phase in SavedRecord = "Execution" OR Phase in SavedRecord = "Deployment" OR Phase in SavedRecord = "Distribution and Rollout")
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Phase">current.phase</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Implementation</Value></condition><condition logical="OR" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Phase">current.phase</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Execution</Value></condition><condition logical="OR" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Phase">current.phase</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Deployment</Value></condition><condition logical="OR" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Phase">current.phase</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">Distribution and Rollout</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: [Implementation CI down mandatory (when ( Phase in SavedRecord = "Implementation" OR Phase in SavedRecord = "Execution" OR Phase in SavedRecord = "Deployment" OR Phase in SavedRecord = "Distribution and Rollout"))]

rule.ruleDesc: Mandatory fields for Change Implementation CI down
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Configuration Item Down">ci.down</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="boolean">true</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: - Mandatory fields for Change Implementation CI down (when ( ci.down in CurrentRecord = true))
